## Profiling Allocation profiling is now enabled by default. You can manage it using the `DD_PROFILING_ALLOCATION_ENABLED` environment variable or the `datadog.profiling.allocation_enabled` setting in the INI file. Although the `DD_PROFILING_EXPERIMENTAL_ALLOCATION_ENABLED` environment variable and `datadog.profiling.experimental_allocation_enabled` INI setting still work, the new ones take precedence.
### Added - GA allocation profiling #2038 - disable allocation profiling if JIT is enabled #2088
